Synopsis


U.C. 0096...

The manufacturing colony Industrial 7, which is still under construction, floats at Lagrange point 1.

A youth named Banagher Links, who grew up without knowing his father, meets a mysterious girl who has stowed away on a ship bound for Industrial 7. As the white mobile suit Unicorn undergoes repeated tests and becomes the subject of diverse speculations, the hands of time begin to move.

Banagher does not yet know that he has been caught up in the conflict surrounding Laplace's Box.

What is Laplace's Box? 
What secret does it contain? 
The hundred-year curse of the Universal Century is about to be resolved.


Read more at http://myanimelist.net/anime/6336/Mobile_Suit_Gundam_Unicorn#qRPKBxC1qjx1lP1g.99

Notes : This is not a new version with new subtitles. (Except for the special that i did)

This is simply a re-encode of all episode for people who have not enough HDD space. That mean smaller files with good quality because of the slow encode.

Format : BD 720p
Audio : Japanese
Subs : English (All credits goes to the team that did them, their names will be on the file name.)

Infos available on the site.

OVA
- Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn (OVA 1-7).
SPECIAL
- 100 Years of Solitude. I use the official subtitles that i modified a little, nothing great, re-style and of course re-encode. Thanks to [Kita] who rip it from the BDMV. This is a recap of Mobile Suit Gundam, Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam, Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ and Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack focusing on Newtype and Zeonism ideals told before UC episode 7. It was include as a bonus with the last OVA.
